channel.title: Comments on: Mesh Networking in Development
channel.description: I am multiple and various - Tomas A. Krag

item.title: By: David Chong
item.dc:creator: David Chong
item.description:
Hi Tom,
Greetings from Borneo!
We are indeed deploying LocustWorld's meshboxes (have four up and running in the city of Kuching) in this part of the world. More information will be up soon but do let me know if I can be any assistance in the interim.
item.content:encoded:
Hi Tom,

Greetings from Borneo!

We are indeed deploying LocustWorld’s meshboxes (have four up and running in the city of Kuching) in this part of the world. More information will be up soon but do let me know if I can be any assistance in the interim.
